title: Blood Moon Gangplank Skin (Not made by me, credit goes to the owner)

embed.description: This is a personal project of a Gangplank's Blood Moon skin from League of Legends. I really like the visual of Blood Moons skins so, I decided to design one for Gangplank. It's based on Asian pirates named 'wokou' and a japanese creature named 'Samebito' (shark man).

body: Also I give credit to u/Rum_Lord who posted this on reddit

replies.body:
Thanks for linking his AS :) Never really thought GP could be a good fit for Blood Moon but this is badass!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I too was skeptical until I saw it to be honest, he just looks like this huge scary samurai
If this was made I would buy 10 of them. GP HYPE
It's super neat artwork, but his barrels are meh, and so is the skin.
